Megan Ming Francis

The NAACP's Anti-Lynching Struggle with Megan Ming Francis

22 Nov 2020

Dan interviews political scientist Megan Ming Francis about the NAACP’s struggle against racist violence in the teens and 20s and how it remade the criminal justice system and the civil rights movement alike. Join a...
